reviewText: I am happy with the product 'cause it's in excellent condition and the delivery came on time. And of course those Boys of the old days are funny without having to hear bad words. You don't see clean movies like in the old days. I'm happy with the movie
Title: East End Boys Haunted House Double Feature

reviewText: It was great to see these movies again.  You cannot find such great acting talent in today's shows.  It is good to see it in the original black and white also.  I plan to collect all of their shows.
Title: East End Boys Haunted House Double Feature

reviewText: I used to watch the old Bowery Boys movies in the theatre so I was pleased to see them available on dvd - what a let down. These films look like they were taken from really rubbish quality old video tapes complete with scratches, blips & jumps - I don't expect movies of this vintage to be perfect but in view of the 3 Stooges box sets that I have bought from you which are brilliant this lapse in quality is a disgrace to Amazon & collectors should avoid being ripped off - hope this helps. I returned my copy for a refund on Feb 8th - it's now Feb 22nd & still waiting. Never again.
Title: East End Boys Haunted House Double Feature

reviewText: I ordered a copy of this on Amazon after I read some reviews on line. I only remember watching them on black & white TV in the 60's on Saturday mornings so I was used to a few blips and lines in the picture as these are very old movies that have not been restored. Well I read one review by someone who was not happy with it . Well sorry about your luck but I have seen much worse , these films are worth watching. The first one has the patina of a old film but very watchable and what a classic ! Bela plays a great part and it has a twist to the story in the end. The second film almost looks to be restored. It is very clean . I recomend this one !
summary: East End Boys Haunted House Double Feature
Title: East End Boys Haunted House Double Feature

reviewText: What fun! The Bowery Boys and a haunted house, times 2! Add a bit of the legend Bela Lugosi and you have a night of shivers and laughs!
Title: East End Boys Haunted House Double Feature

reviewText: This scary comedy double feature contains 2 film with The Bowery Boys (aka The Dead End Kids, East End Kids, etc) running around a haunted house. The first movie features Bela Lugosi at his menacing best. I am reminded of "Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein" by these movies and their light and innocent humor. Muggs and the boys are interesting images of what New York youth looked like back then. The rest of the country must have thought that New Yorkers are pretty goofy. Mild shocks and laughs make this a fun DVD to watch in the dark with a bowl of Fiddle Faddle!
summary: Bela Lugosi Meets The Bowery Boys!
Title: East End Boys Haunted House Double Feature
